openGraph.title: London Borough of Camden
openGraph.description: We worked with London Borough of Camden to develop a high quality solution for their customer facing council tax services portal.

quote.text: Featurist were able to rapidly develop a high quality solution for our customer facing council tax services and were instrumental in helping to mature our in house agile development process. I would definitely use Featurist again, and have no hesitation in recommending them.
quote.author: Chris Burnett, Camden / Solution Architect
